channel.title: Please help me with people getting on my server!
channel.description:
i have no idea how to get people connected to my server!!! please talk in noob language and please not hamachi unless i got to... and if you tell me how to use no-ip please give thurough instructions cuz all guides ive seen dont teach me, so pleeease help :(
ps: i use hybridscape...im not sure how to use others =S

item.title: Please help me with people getting on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Meatyfrog Meatyfrog
item.description:
@Meatyfrog wrote:

[quote=“xx nub xx, post:3, topic:77023”][quote author=daanrack link=topic=113000.msg1123312#msg1123312 date=1176114353]
ok, i noob language, HYBRID SCAPE ITS A SERVER THAT IS NOT UPDATED…!!! Download TestScape , its pretty easy to use it, just edit files and compile them (SAve them with a file named compiler or compile). I can tell you step by step how to create your server on MSN messenger, daanrack@hotmail.com or i can tell you on hamachi or here, Ps: its pretty hard to use no-ip, its better to use hamachi
[/quote]

[ul][li]1. Testscape = shit. Pimpscape is better for beginners.[/li]
[li]2. No-ip is not hard to use, the only reason i dont use it is because my router is not compatable with the no-ip duc so i cant use no-ip[/li][/ul][/quote]
it jsut takes port forwarding and at that point you should just use your ip

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me with people getting on my server!
